Question
========

In a regression analysis, the *explanatory variable* x has a standard deviation that is twice as small as that of the *response variable* y. Furthermore, the *slope* b of the regression line has the value 0.4. The correlation between x and y is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.2.
* 0.4.
* 0.8.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Correct
* 0.4.: Incorrect
* 0.8.: Incorrect
